display_long_description:
In this immersive VR game, you play as a gorilla exploring a vast, lush forest. The twist? You can customize your gorilla’s look with a variety of fun and unique hats, available for purchase at in-game shops scattered across the forest. These hats aren’t just for style—some come with special abilities to enhance gameplay. From a dapper top hat to a Viking helmet with horns, the hat options range from silly to regal, allowing you to give your gorilla a personality that matches your playstyle.

The shops are tucked into hidden corners of the forest, each with its own theme. Some are run by quirky forest creatures, while others are located in ancient ruins or near serene waterfalls. The items on offer change daily, so exploration is key to finding new hats and accessories. You can earn in-game currency through activities like solving challenges, discovering secrets, or just enjoying the environment. 

Certain hats grant abilities like increased climbing stamina or the ability to detect hidden items, adding an extra layer of depth to the experience. Whether you’re swinging through trees or lounging by a river, your gorilla’s style is fully customizable. The game offers a perfect blend of adventure, fun, and personalization, letting you express yourself while exploring the wilderness from a gorilla’s perspective.
